text: evarkal (porukkuriya) vakanattai nir taruvir ena um'mitam vantu, â€˜â€˜unkalai nan erri anuppakkutiya vakanam ennitam illaiye'' enru nir kuriya camayattil, tankalitamum celavukkuriya porul illatupona tukkattinal tankal kankaliliruntu tarai taraiyaka kannir vatittavarkalaka (tam iruppitam) tirumpic cenrarkalo avarkal mitum (porukkuc cellatataip parri oru kurramum illai)
